name: Pagea's drop TWO letters # 2 Trivia Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's your clue for the first 10 letter word:

An object that is swinging backwards and forwards.

Now drop two letters to get an 8 letter word:

A hormone produced by the adrenal gland.

Now a 6 letter word:

There are 7 of them in a rainbow.

Now a 4 letter word:

A low and comfortable temperature.

Finally a 2 letter word:

Shorthand for company.

Repeat the process with this NEW 10 letter word:

The Houses of ______, the home of the government in England.
A fabric used to make clothes.
Referring to the upper chambers of the heart.
The home of a wild animal.
